body.name: Area Rugs for Bedroom Living Room,4' x 6' Tie Dye Light Grey Fluffy Shag Fuzzy Carpet, Plush Shaggy Rug,Thickened Non-Slip Area Rug,Nursery Rugs for Kids Room Home Décor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 12 mins
features: 【High Quality Material】:The area rugs are supported by high quality natural fibres and made through a multi-step process, making them super soft and durable. It is soft to touch, warm and beautiful, as well as being tough, non-shedding, colourfast and odourless. The surface of the carpet is tight to the touch and soft as stepping on clouds. Children can play on the carpet, the family can relax and rest on the shag area rug

【Non-slip bottom】:The back of the shag area rug has been upgraded with thousands of anti-slip points, increasing the friction between the carpet and the floor. And we also provide you with anti-slip stickers inside the package, more firmly let the carpet and the ground close to each other.Provides warmth and comfort between your family and cold floors while making your family feel safer due to the strong anti-slip capability.

【Simple and Premium Design Style】:The fluffy soft carpet adopts minimalist design and modern style concept, versatile and premium, can be applied to different room styles. And our soft fluffy rugs come in a variety of colours, tie-dye rugs, solid colour rugs, to meet any of your needs. The size of the area rug is also diversified, suitable for living room, bedroom, nursery, children's playro

【CARE TIP】: We recommend using a handheld Vacuum to clean our shaggy rugs, but you can also use can also be wiped with a damp cloth or cleaned by hand, it is easier to protect our area rugs and make them fluffier and softer. Note: We do not recommend machine cleaning.

【WARM TIPS】In order to facilitate shipping, our Shag Area Rugs are vacuum sealed, so it is normal to see some wrinkles. You need to wait for 2-3 days until it fluffs up, we apologise for any inconvenience caused, we will give you a satisfactory solution in time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Luxurious Soft Fluffy Rugs for Perfect Home Décor Do you feel like your living room is missing something? A living room plush rug can infuse your space with comfort and warmth. The luxurious feel of a plush rug can add style to any room. Get ready to take off your shoes and bury your toes in a plush rug. Trust us, you'll love everything shaggy carpeting brings to your home.

Stays in Place Thousands of small, durable PVC dots will help prevent the carpet from sliding across the floor. In addition, we also include a non-slip sticker to further minimize carpet slippage, allowing family and friends to exercise and relax on the carpet with greater peace of mind! No-Shedding When wound with ring yarn, it benefits from separate spindle drive technology that enhances the twist that holds all the fibers together, making the yarn stronger and less likely to shed, giving families greater peace of mind. Exquisite wrapping edge The carpet adopts delicate and neat wrapping edge, the locking edge is very tight, which can be more durable, and the patterned wrapping edge is also more beautiful and exquisite.

Easy to clean Do not machine clean!!! Try vacuuming area rugs with a low-power vacuum cleaner; surface dust and dirt can be easily removed. Hand wash or wipe dirty parts with cold water and a mild detergent, then air dry. High Pile Carpet The surface has a tight and tight pile, which not only gives a soft feel, but also keeps your feet off the cold floor and helps to minimize noise when walking. Child and pet friendly We know that family and children are very important to you, which is why our rugs are made of 100% polyester. All of our rugs are child and pet friendly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and fluffy
reviews.reviewText: I like that it’s fluffy and soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug is possibly the softest rug I've ever seen. It is shaggy, but not so much that it doesn't clean well with a vacuum. It has a rubbery back on it that helps it to not slide on my vinyl plank flooring and it also has sticky pieces to help stick it to the floor if you want to use them. I chose not to and it's really fine without it. It is cushy and comfortable. The color is deep and rich and constant throughout. It is thick and no spots that look bald or thin. I have paid way more for an 8x10 that wasn't as nice as this so I think the price is great. I recommend without reservation. You will love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST rug of all time
reviews.reviewText: I have a strange addiction to buying rugs. I own more rugs than any one person should ever own. I switch out all of the rugs in my house for the holidays to change the color to match my decorations. So please do not take it lightly when I say that this is the best rug I have ever owned. It is beautiful, soft, plush, and most importantly as I got the white one… easy to clean. I have a 6 month old baby and he has spit up all colors of food on this thing and with some stain remover spray and paper towels I have had no issues getting it back to perfect condition quickly.This rug is amazing and every single person who has come into my house since I put it down has commented on how nice it is and how they want one.This was intended as a holiday rug and I was going to roll it up and switch back to my normal rug. That will not be happening. This rug stays. It’s highly possible that I find this same rug in other colors and slowly replace out all of my previous favorite rugs.Do not pass this up. Get this rug.If this review hasn’t convinced you enough, just look at how happy my son is laying on it. I also look that happy laying on it. You will also be that happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent for the cost! Soft and nice color!
reviews.reviewText: It’s very soft and silky, and the pink is a perfect light bubble gum pink. The material is synthetic and hard to vacuum, but it’s doable. For the cost, couldn’t expect more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute rug and super soft!
reviews.reviewText: This rug isn't super thick, and can be a little bit of a pain to vacuum/clean (I have a GSD/Lab mix) but the color is fun, looks great in my girls' room, and is soft enough that they love laying on it when they play. I do have it over carpet so if you had it over hard floors you may want a cushioned backer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t realize how shaggy this area rug is. My vacuum has caught some of the fluff up and now it has a couple of bald spots. So be careful with the rotor/beater bar, in fact if you can turn that off, it’d be best. It is very soft though and feet love that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great large soft area rug.
reviews.reviewText: I needed a large rug to cover an open area of carpet in the master bedroom. After spending a few days steam cleaning stains and never wanting to do that again, I thought a rug would be the best solution.This rug is perfect. It's large, very soft, as a non slip underside and easy to machine wash. It came with a package of tape to keep the rug from moving more than it does. The material looks natural but has a light synthetic feel to it. It's feels so soft for being so thin. It can get slippery if you're walking on this and wearing socks. This is well made. The stitching around the edges is solid. Hardly any fraying. This rug is much more suited to resting on top of carpet. Not sure how well it would do over wood floors. Overall great product. Great value for the price listed.
